sentences.sContent: With the rapid development of network and communication technologies, there comes an urgent and higher requirement on the verification, which should be more veracious, safe and practicable.
sentences.sContent_eng: With the rapid development of network and communication technologies, there comes an urgent and higher requirement on the verification, which should be more veracious, safe and practicable.
sentences.sCn: 随着网络技术与通信技术的飞速发展，现代社会对个人身份识别的准确性、安全性与实用性提出了更高的要求。

remMethod.val: ver (真实) + acious (多…的) → 说有多真实， 就有多真实 → 可靠的

words.tran: 诚实；精确性；老实；说真实话
